data

Class Road

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Road
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CarAcceptor

    public class Road
extends java.lang.Object
implements CarAcceptor
    A road holds cars and when runs, runs all the Car Objects it is holding and then re-enqueues itself.
